name: fragmentarily
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that is not complete: This paper attempts to examine events that have been only fragmentarily mentioned so far. Being neither a singer nor a pianist, I knew the piece only fragmentarily.
More examplesFewer examplesThese historical documents have only been fragmentarily preserved.As the story unfolded, a portrait of the scientist developed fragmentarily but consistently.We glimpse her past life only fragmentarily as the novel develops.The evidence fragmentarily available suggests that it was not unusual for a woman to be the sole breadwinner in a household.
